channel.title: rOpenGov on Daniel Antal, CFA
channel.description: Recent content in rOpenGov on Daniel Antal, CFA

item.title: Programatic Approach To Work With European Regional Data Panels
item.description: A very important part of my work is to pre-process data, and integrate various data tables into tidy, comprehensive data tables or databases. This is particularly difficult but rewarding when I work with statistics on sub-national, regional level. While country borders are very rarely change in the world, regional boundaries are changing on average every three years withing the European Union. Putting together data with 2010, 2013, 2017 and the forthcoming 2021 regional boundaries is a very difficult task.
